text: You are in a dark forest. Do you go left or right?
You encounter a wild animal. Do you fight or flee?
You find a hidden treasure chest. Do you open it or leave it?
You bravely fight the animal and win! Do you continue exploring or head home?
You flee safely and find a safe path out of the forest. Do you take the path or explore more?
You open the chest and find gold! Do you take the gold or leave it?
You leave the chest and continue your journey. Do you follow the path ahead or rest?
You discover an ancient ruin filled with secrets. Do you explore the ruin or leave?
You head home safely. The End.
You take the path and find your way out of the forest. The End.
You explore more and discover a hidden waterfall. The End.
You take the gold and live a wealthy life. The End.
You leave the gold and continue your journey, content with your adventure. The End.
You follow the path and discover a beautiful meadow. The End.
You rest and are soon found by a search party. The End.
You explore the ruin and uncover ancient artifacts. The End.
You leave the ruin and continue your adventures. The End.
